name: Intercom - Testing JS API
description: A way to test the Intercom Javascript API

APP1.description: the app_id of your main app

APP1_SECRET.description: the secret key of your app

APP2.description: If you have multiple apps, the app_id of your 2nd app

APP2_NAME.description: If you have multiple apps, the name of your 2nd app

APP2_SECRET.description: If you have multiple apps, the secret key of your 2nd app
